data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Children should never be fed food that is round in shape due to choking hazards. For ____, ____ of ____ dog ____ banana ____ of ____ the ____ size ____ get ____ in ____ throat. In fact, the majority of deaths under three years of age are due to choking on things like coins, sliced carrots, or grapes.
data.partBlankContent: Children should never be fed food that is round in shape due to choking hazards. For exa____, di___ of h__ dog o_ banana a__ of exa____ the ri___ size t_ get lod___ in t__ throat. In fact, the majority of deaths under three years of age are due to choking on things like coins, sliced carrots, or grapes.
data.answer: 儿童不应该吃圆形的食物，因为有窒息的危险。例如，吃热狗或香蕉是有可能卡在喉咙里的危险食物。事实上，大多数三岁以下的死亡是由于被硬币、切好的胡萝卜片或葡萄之类的东西噎死的。
